author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
We're back with The Indie Hour Episode Forty-Three! This series focuses on games you may have never even heard of and gives us an inside look at the wider world of independantly published Tabletop Wargames of all genres.

The endless summers of youth may seem like a hazy memory to most of us; but fear not! The Fearless NiL has drafted a portal back to simpler times, where the bright veneer of childhood covered the fathomless darkness beneath. Looking to play out EARTHBOUND, South Park or maybe even a touch of STRANGER THINGS? This is probably the game for you. Let's dive in!

Check out the rulebook in digital  HERE: https://www.drivethrurpg.com/en/product/520730/childhood?affiliate_id=210041
title: The GMG Indie Hour Ep 043 - CHILDHOOD  by Opportunistic NIL
